channel.title: Web client
channel.description:
Hello i am not sure if i have posted at the right place if it's wrong please tell me were it belongs.
I was just wondering how to make a webclient like this one, they use a SMF forum.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/708/logincx.png/][IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/7163/logincx.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Web client

@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

That server is integrated with the SMF forums. Learn SQL and PHP and you could do it in a heart heart beat.
